entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is described as having wrinkles and a wrangled beard. He is also mentioned as being able to calm Ariana down when she was in one of her rages.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is described as always being up in his bedroom reading books and counting prizes. He is also mentioned as not wanting to be bothered with Ariana.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is described as having rages that Aberforth could calm down. She is also mentioned as being unable to control her actions during one of these rages.

entities.name: aberfroths mother
entities.description: Aberforth's mother is mentioned as not being young and being killed in an accident caused by Ariana.

relationships.description: Aberforth could calm down Ariana when she was in one of her rages.
